definition.name: Popover
definition.purpose: Provides a wrapper for displaying popover content anchored to a trigger element.
definition.description: A reusable popover component built on top of Radix UI's PopoverPrimitive.Root. It renders a popover container that can be controlled and composed with trigger and content components. Used to display floating content anchored to another element.

initial.data: Popover is closed and not visible.

when.description: User interacts with the trigger element (e.g., clicks or focuses).

effects: Popover content is displayed anchored to the trigger element.

when.description: User clicks outside the popover or presses Escape.

definition.visualLayout: No visual output by itself; acts as a container for popover content and trigger.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI PopoverPrimitive.Root. Should be used with PopoverTrigger and PopoverContent for full functionality.

definition.name: PopoverTrigger
definition.purpose: Acts as the interactive element that toggles the popover's visibility.
definition.description: A reusable trigger component for the popover, built on top of Radix UI's PopoverPrimitive.Trigger. It should be used as a child of Popover to control the display of PopoverContent.

when.description: User interacts with the trigger (e.g., click, focus).

definition.visualLayout: Renders the trigger element for the popover.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI PopoverPrimitive.Trigger. Should be used inside Popover.

definition.name: PopoverContent
definition.purpose: Displays the floating content of the popover anchored to the trigger.
definition.description: A reusable content component for the popover, built on top of Radix UI's PopoverPrimitive.Content and PopoverPrimitive.Portal. It displays the floating panel with custom styling and positioning, and can be customized via props.

className.description: Additional CSS classes for custom styling.

align.description: Alignment of the popover content relative to the trigger.

effects: Popover content is rendered in a portal and displayed with animation.
Popover content is removed from the DOM.

definition.visualLayout: Renders a styled floating panel anchored to the trigger element.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI PopoverPrimitive.Content and PopoverPrimitive.Portal. Accepts custom className, align, and sideOffset props.

definition.name: PopoverAnchor
definition.purpose: Provides an anchor point for the popover content.
definition.description: A reusable anchor component for the popover, built on top of Radix UI's PopoverPrimitive.Anchor. It is used to specify a custom anchor element for the popover content positioning.
definition.visualLayout: Renders an anchor element for popover positioning.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI PopoverPrimitive.Anchor. Used for advanced positioning scenarios.
